abstract: HARTFORD (Bloomberg News)  Defense lawyers rested their case at the fraud trial of General Reinsurance executives accused of helping the American International Group mislead investors, without jurors hearing from the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett.
snippet: HARTFORD (Bloomberg News)  Defense lawyers rested their case at the fraud trial of General Reinsurance executives accused of helping the American International Group mislead investors, without jurors hearing from the billionaire investor Warren E...
lead_paragraph: HARTFORD (Bloomberg News)  Defense lawyers rested their case at the fraud trial of General Reinsurance executives accused of helping the American International Group mislead investors, without jurors hearing from the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett.

headline.main: Buffett Won’t Be Witness in Fraud Trial
headline.print_headline: Buffett Won’t Be Witness In Fraud Trial
